description:
I REALLY LOVED IT 
But i dont know exactly how it works 
it really needs a manual (that's why i gave 4 stars instead of 5)

A bit esoteric, definitely needs a manual of some kind. The conditions also don't appear to work quite right. Has a lot of potential and could be very useful given the right need. I'd like to see an option to just use a barebones version without conditions.

these tools are a great asset but requires abit of self-tutoring.

thank you sirs and/or madames !
summary: does more than most PAID tools !

description: its.. technically great, but i have a spider in my initiative tracker that i cant get rid of (it might be because the spider has a whitespace before it's name.). soo obviously tried to restart (the terminal the pc) and even reinstalling did not fix the spider... sooo yeah .. its great so long as you don't try and add something to the initiative tracker that has a whitespace before it's name
Jolie au vue. J'aime bien merci
